package.name: libcap
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xJf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi make -j $jobcount PREFIX=/usr
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} RAISE_SETFCAP=no prefix=/usr lib=lib
